an5.228:1.3: Ye te atithi pahuna, te na kalena patipujenti;
an5.228:1.4: ya ta balipatiggahika devata, ta na kalena patipujenti;
an5.228:1.5: ye te samanabrahmana ekabhattika rattuparata virata vikalabhojana, te na kalena patipujenti;
an5.228:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava ussurabhatte kule.
an5.228:2.3: Ye te atithi pahuna, te kalena patipujenti;
an5.228:2.4: ya ta balipatiggahika devata, ta kalena patipujenti;
an5.228:2.5: ye te samanabrahmana ekabhattika rattuparata virata vikalabhojana, te kalena patipujenti;
an5.228:2.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa samayabhatte kule”ti.
